attributes.action: Become Founding Members  of a organisation called The New  Common Market
attributes.additional_details: There are other countries who are locked in this E.U. domineering existence who no doubt would want to revert to and join this out of hand situation and  if there are sufficient to be founder members then the present regime is finished  or will only survive as a shadow of what it has formed itself into
attributes.background: a new organisation ,  with no overriding political supremacy or involvement , with  any controlling input being from democratically elected representative , Each member having and retaining  its own sovereign control on all other non trade sovereign  government and legislature
